pullRequest.body:
Split `Algebra.Idempotents` into `Algebra.Group.Idempotent`, `Algebra.GroupWithZero.Idempotent`, `Algebra.Ring.Idempotent`. Rename `Order.Idempotents` to `Algebra.Order.Ring.Idempotent`.
